author: ralexstokes
content:
<@466006586477772831> <@425572898787426305> 

i think we add a notion of “blinded blob” — the proposer can sign the same root and the relay just provides this root, rather than the entire blob(a)

author: ralexstokes
content: the exact details will depend on what the final data structures look like

author: ralexstokes
content: you can store files on chain now, it is just expensive; more data availability allows for cheaper data on-chain (so bigger files for same cost) although the 4844 etc data has different availability guarantees (and the rest of the chain for that matter with EIP-4444)
